unnormalised: Arre yaar, tension not! For the job application, just upload your PAN card, voter ID, and that college ID you still have. They also wanted my employee ID and Aadhar card no., but I told them, "Boss, too much info already!" Hope you get the job, bhai!
normalised: Arre yaar, tension not! For the job application, just upload your P-A-N card, voter I-D, and that college I-D you still have. They also wanted my employee I-D and Aadhar card number, but I told them, "Boss, too much info already!" Hope you get the job, bhai!
